mapper.sql: id, `name`, code, sort, `status`, deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_role (`name`, code, sort, `status`, deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_role
id,
`name`, code, sort, `status`, deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
on duplicate key update
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

insert into sys_role
id,
`name`,
code,
sort,
`status`,
deleted,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
#{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},

on duplicate key update
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select code from sys_user_role sur left join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.id where sur.user_id = #{userId,javaType=integer}
